frozen.name: gnome-shell-extension-ssh-tray
frozen.shortDescription: Simple SSH extension to allow you to connect to your hosts at ~/.ssh/config and ~/ssh/know_hosts file from Gnome top bar.
frozen.longDescription: Simple SSH extension to allow you to connect to your hosts at ~/.ssh/config and ~/ssh/know_hosts file from Gnome top bar.
